scripts.cleanup:win: npm run cleanup-report:win && npm run cleanup-json:win && npm run cleanup-results:win
scripts.posttest:win: npm run merge-json:win && npm run generate-report
scripts.cypress-test:win: npm run cleanup:win && npx cypress run --reporter mochawesome && npm run posttest:win
scripts.cleanup-report:linux: if [ -d mochawesome-report ]; then rm -rf mochawesome-report; fi
scripts.cleanup-json:linux: if [ -f Consolidated_Report.json ]; then rm -f Consolidated_Report.json; fi
scripts.cleanup-results:linux: if [ -d test-results ]; then rm -rf test-results; fi
scripts.cleanup:linux: npm run cleanup-report:linux && npm run cleanup-json:linux && npm run cleanup-results:linux
scripts.posttest:linux: npm run merge-json:linux && npm run generate-report
scripts.cypress-test:linux: npm run cleanup:linux && npx cypress run --reporter mochawesome && npm run posttest:linux
